subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Julián Tavárez pitched seven scoreless innings, switching to cruise control after the visiting Boston Red Sox homered three times in the first two innings on the way to routing the Atlanta Braves, 11-0, last night.
snippet: Julián Tavárez pitched seven scoreless innings, switching to cruise control after the visiting Boston Red Sox homered three times in the first two innings on the way to routing the Atlanta Braves, 11-0, last night.
